title: Haydock Finance appoints new senior underwriter for structured deals
description: Emily Barnett's role will involve dealing with more intricate and higher-value financial arrangements.
content:
Haydock Finance has appointed Emily Barnett as a senior underwriter in its credit team, focusing on structured finance deals.

With more than a decade of experience in the asset finance industry, Barnett joins Haydock after a tenure at Paragon Bank.

According to Haydock, her role will involve dealing with more intricate and higher-value financial arrangements.

Commenting on the appointment, Barnett said: "Haydock’s strong commercial appetite and emphasis on relationship building really stood out and made the decision to join a very easy one. I am looking forward to working with our introducers and helping to deliver long-term collaborative success."

Haydock Finance structured credit head Angela Hendrie stated: "We are thrilled that Emily has joined the team. Her professionalism, commerciality and dedication to delivering service excellence make her the ideal addition. I am confident she will add great value to both the team and our introducer partners."

The company specialises in providing funding for various business assets with a range of financial solutions that include hire purchase, finance lease, refinance, growth guarantee scheme (GGS), and chattel mortgage.

The company's financing solutions target buses and coaches, heavy commercial vehicles and trailers, cars and light commercial vehicles, agricultural and forestry equipment and others.

Haydock Finance also delivers vendor finance solutions aimed at facilitating business expansion and improving cash flow.

In June, Haydock Finance completed its third public securitisation, Hermitage 25, which involved the placement of £380m ($504.8m) in receivables into a public Asset-Backed Security (ABS).

In May, Haydock Finance observed an increase in asset finance transactions valued over £500,000, enhancing the structuring and execution of large-ticket funding.

"Haydock Finance appoints new senior underwriter for structured deals" was originally created and published by Leasing Life, a GlobalData owned brand.
